articles.title: Xiaomi Unveils 14 Ultra Flagship Smartphone with Titanium Build, and Satellite Connectivity; Global Release Imminent - Pune Pulse
articles.description: Xiaomi has launched its latest flagship smartphone, the 14 Ultra, featuring cutting-edge technology and design elements. The smartphone boasts a 1-inch image sensor co-engineered with Leica, a quad-camera system, a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, an AISP neural…
